isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1997) - SECTION 3.5: CIRCUIT FUNCTION AND DIAGNOSTICS - ELECTRONIC CONTROL MODULE SELF DIAGNOSTICS - FLASH CODE 615 - ATA CODE SID 254 FMI 13 - ECM: PROGRAMMABLE PARAMETER KAM CORRUPT FAULT

svcproc.title: FLASH CODE 615 - ATA CODE SID 254 FMI 13 - ECM: PROGRAMMABLE PARAMETER KAM CORRUPT FAULT
svcproc.para:
Flash Code 615 can be set when Flash code 224 is set. If 224 is present, refer to Keep Alive Memory Power (KAM PWR, Figure 3.137
) to diagnose.
If code 224 IS NOT SET, code 615 indicates that the ECM's RAM is defective. Replace the ECM.
